name: Infocon Alert State Indicator
author: ax11

sections.description:
Displays the current infocom status, as announced by ISC (http://isc.sans.org)
in a widget. You can choose between, text, colored text, small and regular image to display.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip and upload the complete directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the widget in your widget area of choice
sections.faq:
None, so far

Installation Instructions

  1. Unzip and upload the complete directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the widget in your widget area of choice
sections.changelog:
1.0

Release

Fixed readme, updated compatibility information

=1.0.2=
changed all external URIs to HTTPS, updated compatibility information
